thread_name: W-9 form for non usa person?
frequent_posters: faiziee, jonbaas, english_voice, misscrystal, salimrezza, imagination7413
thread_text:
Hi Everyone,
I’m from Pakistan and I received email from fiverr couple of days a go that
You are required to fill it out * if you’re defined as a U.S. person by the U.S. tax authorities.
and check this within the next 30 days to keep your Gigs active.
however I’m not USA person and confirm that I provide services outside USA. ( file attached )
Now can any one let me know is there any next step which is required for the verification of non usa person ?
Looking forward for guidance

Best Regrads
Faizan Muhammad
reply_text: This is only for US sellers. All you need to do is select ‘No’.

reply_text:
faiziee:
I’m from Pakistan and I received email from fiverr couple of days a go that
You are required to fill it out * if you’re defined as a U.S. person by the U.S. tax authorities.
Do you really have to start a new topic for this? There’s already a topic – with the answers to your questions, located here:
W-9 US Verification Requirement
News
Hi Everyone, In the next few day, some of you will see that we (Fiverr) will be asking sellers who are defined as a US Person* to complete a W-9 form regarding their activity on Fiverr. You will receive a notification on the Fiverr website and an email message asking you to check your status within 30 days, in a form of a short questionnaire. If in fact you are classified as a US Person*, you will undergo a short process in which you will fill in Form W-9 that contains standard business infor…
This new topic is unnecessary.

reply_text:
If you selected “no”, then you are done with the process.
If you are not a USA citizen, then you don’t need to fill out a W-9 form. It’s as simple as that.
